Posts.Content: GypsyK wrote: I have stage 1, invasive ductal, 1.4cm, grade 2 hormone positive, her2 negative, no nodes involved. Looking to find anyone who did not have radiation following bc like mine and how they are doing 10 years later. Looking to find thoe who did have radiation following bc like mine and how they are doing 10 years later. Trying to see if recurrence and subsequent bc that occurred after no radiation outweighs the risk of occurence of secondary non breast cancer (lung, bone, blood,etc.) as a result of radiation. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation after lumpectomy GypsyK
